about_the_game:
CONTROLS

A controller is required to play this game.

STORY

Groupe Titan LLC was a mining mega-corporation in the 22nd century. Following the collapse of the environment, humanity is lost... when two maintenance robots are awakened by a mysterious entity. They start looking to see if they can understand what happened... and how to save life on Earth.

GAMEPLAY

Play Anima by switching between two characters: Min.I, a perky maintenance robot that can run and jump over obstacles and bounce up some walls, and Andro.ID, a bigger and slower robot capable of using the Anima energy and magnetism to move objects around her.
They must cooperate to solve puzzling platforming sequences that stand as they repair their broken world.

Lift magnetic elements from the surroundings, construct and deconstruct objects with the Anima energy, bounce off the walls, and make your way through the gigantic station!

Featuring

  • 2 playable characters.

  • A story mode and bonus levels of pure platforming fun.

  • Paths that must be altered to allow the characters to pass through.

  • A post-apocalyptic sci-fi environment that tells a story of regret and hope.

  • Running, jumping and bouncing your way through the path you puzzled out.

PRODUCTION 

Anima is a student project produced in 15 weeks by the 2023-2024 cohort of the Campus ADN, a public video game college in Montreal, under supervision of industry professionals.

short_description: Anima is a puzzle-platformer in cold, technological and mysterious surroundings. Discover an abandoned mining station through two of its maintenance robots, Min.I and Andro.ID. Move or deconstruct obstacles to make a path to your goals and discover what became of your creators
